name: Pitchfork of Destiny: A Slimy Adventure
name_original: Pitchfork of Destiny: A Slimy Adventure
description:
An ancient evil has arisen, Nonag has returned to wreak havoc upon the world. No one is safe, everyone, even your friends and quest-givers, can turn into slime at any moment!

In order to defeat Nonag you must recover the only weapon powerful enough to combat the rampaging slime, the Pitchfork of Destiny. Wield the magical Pitchfork to defend your town from the out of control spread of slime across the world.
A fevered famicom dream. Explore a classic 16-bit storyworld affected by real-world temperatures. Featuring razor-sharp pixels, dynamically changing environments and a deep customisable magic system.
